name: Spellarium 4
description: Eric, the wizard, has spent over 400 years in service to the Gods. A wizard's life is long yet not endless, so now Eric has to renew his life power. The Tree of Life will help him! Growing the Tree Of Life isn't an easy task. As usual, you'll help Eric build the Tree of Life by playing Match 3 levels as well as some additional bonus games: Spot the Difference, Hidden object scenes, Mahjong, and Solitaire!
